welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tianjin, China! Get ready to explore the city's unique blend of modern and traditional charm, known for its beautiful architecture, rich history, and delicious cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful time discovering all that Tianjin has to offer.

restaurants.name: Blue Frog (蓝蛙)

restaurants.address: 兴安路166号恒隆广场3楼, 天津市, 天津市
